[docs]class Error(Exception):
    """Base class for exceptions in this module.

    Attributes:
        cname -- class in which the error occurred
        code -- error code
        msg -- error message
    """

    def __init__(self, cname, code, msg):
        self.cname = cname
        self.msg = msg
        self.code = code




[docs]class APICallError(Error):
    """Generic Exception raised for non-2xx errors
    returned from API calls.
    """
